summary.span: 表示由万维网联合会 (W3C) 定义的数字签名的 C14N XML 标准化转换（带注释）。

span.span: Represents the C14N XML canonicalization transform for a digital signature as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), with comments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示 C14N xml 规范化转换，该转换描述 xml 文档的规范格式。The class represents the C14N XML canonicalization transform that describes the canonical form of an XML document. 此转换允许签名者使用 XML 文档的规范形式创建摘要。This transform allows a signer to create a digest using the canonical form of an XML document. 然后，收件人可以使用同一转换的 XML 文档的相同规范形式来验证数字签名。A recipient can then verify the digital signature using the same canonical form of the XML document with the same transform. 如果需要对包含注释的 XML 文档进行签名，请使用类。Use the class when you need to sign an XML document that contains comments. 请注意，不能直接创建规范化转换类的新实例。Note that you cannot directly create a new instance of a canonicalization transform class. 若要指定规范化转换，请将描述转换的统一资源标识符 (URI) 传递给 属性，该属性可从属性进行访问 。To specify a canonicalization transform, pass the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the transform to the property, which is accessible from the property. 若要获取对规范化转换的引用，请使用属性 ，该属性可从属性进行访问 。To acquire a reference to the canonicalization transform, use the property, which is accessible from the property. 描述类的 URI 由 字段定义。The URI that describes the class is defined by the field. 描述类的 URI 由 字段和 字段定义。The URI that describes the class is defined by the field and the field. 有关 C14N with 注释转换的详细信息，请参阅 W3C [XMLDSIG 规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/)的6.5 节和6.6.1 节。For more information about the C14N with comments transform, see Sections 6.5 and 6.6.1 of the W3C [XMLDSIG specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/). 规范化算法是在 W3C [规范 XML 规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xml-c14n)中定义的。The canonicalization algorithm is defined in the W3C [Canonical XML specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xml-c14n). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何使用分离的签名对 XML 文件进行签名。The first example demonstrates how to sign an XML file using a detached signature. 此示例 `www.microsoft.com` 在 XML 文件中创建的签名，然后验证该文件。This example creates a signature of `www.microsoft.com` in an XML file and then verifies the file. 第二个示例演示如何使用信封签名对 XML 文件进行签名。The second example demonstrates how to sign an XML file using an envelope signature. 此示例将创建 XML 文件的签名，然后将签名保存在新的 XML 文件中。This example creates a signature of an XML file and
